item.description:
For our next meet up, let’s get together at the Harvest of India to enjoy their indian cuisine.

If you have never had Indian food, this is your opportunity to explore their delicious dishes and be in good company of the group. So, let’s Meetup!

 

About Harvest of India: Harvest of India welcomes you with the smells, sounds, and tastes of India. Take a sensory trip to this distant land and feast on the savory delights. Harvest of India offers all varieties of North and South Indian Food such as Hyderabadi mirchi & bainghan ka salan, chilli chicken, lamb shank, goat curry, peshawari naan and desserts like Rasmalai and strawberry lassi. Come enjoy all your favorites or try something new!

 

Ticket will not be sold the day of the event, either at the place or online. Remember to buy your ticket at  http://speedeals.com/deals/1061

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Social mixer event with 25% off - come out and have fun!
